meanings.definition: A leader or ruler, especially a dictator.
meanings.sent1: The fuhrers of the group made all the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The country was under the control of several fuhrers.
meanings.sent3: The fuhrers of the ants' nest were having a heated debate.
meanings.sent4: In the land of books, the fuhrers were the characters who dictated the story.
meanings.sent5: The image of the fuhrers standing on the balcony addressing the crowd was etched in their minds.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'fuhrer', referring to multiple leaders or rulers.
meanings.sent1: The fuhrers gathered to discuss their plans for the upcoming summit.
meanings.sent2: In history, fuhrers have often shaped the course of nations.
meanings.sent3: The fuhrers of the chess pieces strategized their next moves.
meanings.sent4: The fuhrers of the forest, the mighty trees, stood tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The fuhrers of the council were respected for their wisdom and guidance.
